meeting_request.purpose: Feeling lost and uncertain about what to do next after starting college
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m James, a first-year Political Science major. I’ve taken a few electives so far and really enjoyed some of the history and sociology courses, but I’m still not sure what I want to do with my major. I’ve been thinking about working in politics or nonprofits, but I’m not sure if that’s the right path or if I need to explore other options first. I’m also feeling overwhelmed by all the information I’ve already taken and the demands of college, especially since I’m not in a major that requires a lot of writing or critical thinking. I’m not sure if I should be feeling this way, but it’s definitely affecting my academic and personal engagement.
